name: Microsoft Sentinel
description: Search for WHOIS, Geolocation Data, Incidents, Threat Intelligence Indicators, and Query Logs via Kusto Queries

options.name: Azure AD Registered App Client/Application ID
options.description: Your Azure AD Registered App's Client ID associated with your Microsoft Sentinel Instance.

options.name: Azure AD Registered App Tenant/Directory ID
options.description: Your Azure AD Registered App's Tenant ID associated with your Microsoft Sentinel Instance.

options.name: Azure AD Registered App Client Secret
options.description: Your Azure AD Registered App's Client Secret associated with your Microsoft Sentinel Instance.

options.name: Sentinel Subscription ID
options.description: The Subscription ID associated with your Microsoft Sentinel Instance.

options.name: Sentinel Resource Group Name
options.description: The Resource Group Name associated with your Microsoft Sentinel Instance.

options.name: Sentinel Workspace Name & ID
options.description:
The {{WORKSPACE_NAME}}:{{WORKSPACE_ID}} for the workspace associated with your Microsoft Sentinel Instance.
(e.g. sentinel-workspace1: 8dbg2cdf-fd06-42zf-8557-4606c98adb2a)

options.name: Kusto Query String
options.description: Kusto Query String to execute on the Sentinel Log Analytics Workspace. The string `{{ENTITY}}` will be replace by the looked up Entity. For example: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | search "{{ENTITY}}" | take 10

options.name: Kusto Query Summary Fields
options.description: Comma delimited list of field values to include as part of the summary.  These fields must be returned by your Kusto Query. This option must be set to "User can view and edit" or "User can view only".

options.name: Kusto Query Ignore Fields
options.description: Comma delimited list of Fields to ignore from the Kusto Query Results in the Overlay. This option must be set to "User can view and edit" or "User can view only".

options.name: Lookback Days
options.description: The number of days to look back when querying logs, and incidents.

options.name: Ignore Geodata/WHOIS Only Results
options.description: If checked, entities will not return if only Geodata and/or WHOIS data is found, and no other query types have results.
